idea-plugin.name: PySynthetic
idea-plugin.description: A plugin to provide IDE assistance for members and constructors generated by PySynthetic.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.2.0: Provides type autocompletion for generated members and properties based on the specified contract. Only a very limited set of contract expressions is currently supported.
Also improves performance by caching synthetic members information.
0.1.0: Initial version - provides name autocompletion for members and properties.
